text: I am very happy and satisfied with Master Song's teaching. He is patient and his classes are fun and enjoyable. My child likes to attend his classes and always look forward to his classes. The classes are all individually tailored to our needs. Thank you, Top Taekwondo.

Have been with them since 2021. Master Song, Master Kwong and all the instructors are always very patient and kind to the children and they make the classes fun for the kids, always encouraging them. Yet, they do emphasize on discipline and respect, instilling the right values in the kids. My son loves TKD classes and really genuinely look forward to classes every week. Kudos to Master Song & team. Tops!
Discipline is kept in Master Song's dojang in a gentle and effective manner for the young ones. He is patient and approachable and makes the lessons fun for the kids.

Master Song is a great teacher.
He always do the best to the students.
Come and learn from the best in Singapore, Master Song!
